channel.title: Comments on: Displaying .Net Build Warnings in TeamCity
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.dc:creator: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.description: Sorry, I missed your comment when you originally posted. I just scanned through your updated version of the script. That's a great addition, I'm planning on switching over to it :)
item.content:encoded: Sorry, I missed your comment when you originally posted. I just scanned through your updated version of the script. That’s a great addition, I’m planning on switching over to it ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.dc:creator: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.description: Awesome, glad it was useful and thanks for the 8.1 update, I somehow missed that addition.
item.content:encoded: Awesome, glad it was useful and thanks for the 8.1 update, I somehow missed that addition.

item.title: By: Jeff Martin
item.dc:creator: Jeff Martin
item.description:
quick comment that teamcity 8.1 updated so that you can configure the tabs in the interface rather than having to edit the xml file.
https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCD8/Including+Third-Party+Reports+in+the+Build+Results
I really appreciate this blog entry (used it at 2 different jobs now) and I also appreciate the contrib from @Kostiantyn - i used the check for the difference also.
item.content:encoded:
quick comment that teamcity 8.1 updated so that you can configure the tabs in the interface rather than having to edit the xml file.

https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCD8/Including+Third-Party+Reports+in+the+Build+Results

I really appreciate this blog entry (used it at 2 different jobs now) and I also appreciate the contrib from @Kostiantyn – i used the check for the difference also.

item.title: By: Kostiantyn
item.dc:creator: Kostiantyn
item.description: Thanks for the great post! It saved me a lot of time. I played a bit with the script and enhanced it to highlight newly added warnings. You can find updated script here.<br /> http://homenko.net/post/2013/11/22/Enhanced-MSBuild-Warning-report-in-TeamCity<br />
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the great post! It saved me a lot of time. I played a bit with the script and enhanced it to highlight newly added warnings. You can find updated script here.
http://homenko.net/post/2013/11/22/Enhanced-MSBuild-Warning-report-in-TeamCity
